original_text: This shall be the punishment of Egypt, and the punishment of all nations that come not up to keep the feast of tabernacles.
korean_text: 애굽 사람이나 이방 나라 사람이나 초막절을 지키러 올라오지 아니하는 자가 받을 벌이 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: This shall be the punishment of Egypt
and the punishment of all nations
that come not up to keep the feast
